member.name: CRYPT_BLOB_ARRAY
member.summary: The CRYPT_BLOB_ARRAY structure contains an array of CRYPT_DATA_BLOB structures.

member.name: CRYPT_BLOB_ARRAY.cBlob
member.summary: The number of elements in the rgBlob array.

member.name: CRYPT_BLOB_ARRAY.rgBlob
member.summary: An array of CRYPT_DATA_BLOB structures that contains the data blobs.
